song.title: I Want To Be A Machine
song.info:
Lyrics: Deep, deep down Deep down inside There's an error in my mind
I need, need one I need someone To control the things inside
Oh, operator, I need an exit Oh, operator get me out of here
Cant you see? I don't want to be I don't wanna be controlled by fear
I want to be a machine Checking all my systems on a 7-inch TFT screen Listen to me, listen to me, listen to me Can't you see? That I wanna be I wanna, wanna be a machine
